meanings.definition: A photograph of celestial objects or phenomena taken with a telescope or camera.
meanings.sent1: I saw an astrophotograph of the moon and stars in a book.
meanings.sent2: The astrophotograph of the galaxy was displayed in the science museum.
meanings.sent3: The astrophotograph of the comet made me want to learn more about space.
meanings.sent4: Her astrophotograph of the meteor shower was like a window to the universe.
meanings.sent5: The astrophotograph captured the beauty of the night sky perfectly.

meanings.definition: To take a photograph of celestial objects or phenomena.
meanings.sent1: She loves to astrophotograph the constellations with her camera.
meanings.sent2: They decided to astrophotograph the meteor shower last night.
meanings.sent3: I will astrophotograph the planets and show you the pictures later.
meanings.sent4: He astrophotographs the stars as a hobby to relax after work.
meanings.sent5: Astrophotographing the Milky Way requires patience and skill.
